title: accidental leaver buster
body: so i was in the middle of a game when my mom shutdown my pc and we went somewhere so i got the 5 min leaver buster, annoying but i can live with 5 min. then another time i was in a game when my dog tripped and unplugged my ethernet switch causing me to quit but when my ethernet was back up it wouldn't let me sign in so now i have an unintentional leaver buster for 10 min and it's annoying as crap. fyi i do not rage quit, as i try to stay in game no matter what but now it's giving me unwanted trouble. So im asking if there is any way to get rid of the leaver buster quickly

replies.body: so the true story is that these are not the only instances that this has happened as i have had connection issues in the past at lan parties while borrowing my friend's laptop ( he hates windows so he uses linux and wine to run league. in my opinion its asking for issues) so i disconnected before but these are examples that happened once i had my own pc. before i had to use my moms computer running windows vista (again asking for issues) and have had a couple of instances on there. so I have had issues in the past which lead up to where I am now. thanks @mokuto bunshi for the advice but, planning is one of those things that i am not good at (adhd)

That is pretty unfortunate that so much real life stuff kept happening that pulled you out of games. We can't do much about [**leaverbusters**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) here on the boards, keep in mind that you won't get hit with a low priority queue after only one or two left matches. Also be sure to check whether you'll have plenty of time to stay throughout the entire game or not.
